name: FPS Proto2
description:
Project realized within the framework of the DESS in game design at UdeM.

Main inspirations : Quake3 and Tower of Guns.

Realized in 6 weeks part-time.

Co-designers: Théo Ménard, Anton Zhelyeznyy.

Personal tasks

UI/UX :

Health bar

Energy bar

Take damage feed back

Heal feed back

Invulnerability feed back

All menus

Crosshair

Enemy design :

Yellow / Blue / Red Tower 

Level design

Global feel design
